options.name: Airport Hotel
options.description: They target the business clientele, airline passengers, or any guests with cancelled or delayed flights

options.name: Business Hotel
options.description: They primarily cater for the guests who are on business travel

options.name: Bed and Breakfast Hotel
options.description: They are small hotels who target guests in transit or on leisure tour. The owner of B&B usually stays in the same premises and is responsible for serving breakfast to the guests

options.name: Casino Hotel
options.description: They target the guests interested in gambling. Their functions of housekeeping is primary but food and beverage functions are just supportive

options.name: Resort
options.description: They target high-income busy professionals who wish to spend time away from city, noise, and crowd. They offer facilities such as spa, tennis court, fitness and center, sailing, snorkeling, and swimming

options.name: Apartment
options.description: They are located in residential colonies. They provide long-term accommodation for guests. They need to execute an agreement with the guests for the stay of at least one month. All basic amenities such as kitchen, washing machine, dish washer, and beds are provided with once a week housekeeping service

options.name: Suite Hotel
options.description: These hotels offer a living room and an en suite bedroom. The professionals who need to interact with their clients/customers find these hotels a good choice because they can interact with their guests in small meetings without any interruption and sacrificing privacy

options.name: Villa
options.description: A villa might have elaborate pools, gardens, farmlands, and other buildings surrounding the villa

options.name: Chalet
options.description: A chalet is a type of house or cottage made of wood with a heavy, gentle sloping roof and wide edges set at right angles in the front. Also called as Swiss chalet, such homes are very common in Europeâ€™s Alpine region. The term is used to refer to the hut of a herder. These days, chalets have emerged as holiday homes for ski and hiking enthusiasts, who prefer to stay on mountain tops during their vacations

options.name: Cabin
options.description: A cabin is any mountain or vacation home in the Smoky Mountains

options.name: Boatel
options.description: They are on the houseboats such as Shikara in Kashmir

options.name: Motel
options.description: They are small hotels usually located on highways. Transit guests use them

options.name: Floating Hotel
options.description: They are on the cruise ships, large lakes, or rivers

options.name: Rotel
options.description: They are hotels on wheels such as Deccan Odyssey train
